summary: TRANSMISSION WENT OUT OF OVER DRIVE WHILE DRIVING DOWN THE FREEWAY, WOULD NOT GO BACK INTO OVER DRIVE, "CHECK ENGINE" LIGHT CAME ON 5 DIFFERENT TIMES, DEALER FIRST TOLD ME I MAY NOT HAVE REPLACED GAS CAP PROPERLY AFTER FILLING WITH GAS, DEALER WORKED ON DURANGO EACH TIME UNDER WARRANTY, DEALER FINALLY CHANGED TRANSMISSION FLUID AND SEALS AND RE-BOOTED OR RE-PROGRAMMED COMPUTER AND CHECK ENGINE LIGHT IS FINALLY OFF. I LOST 3 DAYS ON AN OUT OF TOWN TRIP (CENTRAL OREGON)WAITING FOR A DEALER TO OPEN ON MONDAY TO CHECK IT, HE TOLD ME TO CONTINUE ON TRIP, HE COULD FIND NOTHING WRONG. (TO GET ME FAR FROM HIS DEALERSHIP?) I LOST ABOUT TWO WEEKS USAGE OUT OF THE DURANGO AND HAVE LOST ANY FAITH IN THE CAR BEING RELIABLE AS IT HAS SEVERAL PROBLEMS. *JB
